title: Before the Battle of Hastings (Avant la bataille de Hastings) (plate) from Le Surréalisme en 1947
medium: Woodcut from an illustrated book with 18 lithographs, four etchings (two with aquatint), two woodcuts, one photogravure, and one ready-made object
dimensions: composition (irreg.) and page: 9 3/8 x 8 1/16" (23.8 x 20.5 cm)
